latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).

fields.value: Household responses on natural disasters: Tropical storm Milenyo in Tubuan 2007

dsDescriptionValue.value: To examine how households respond to natural disasters by analyzing the case of tropical storm Milenyo that hit the Philippines in 2006.

keywordValue.value: Household composition, Crisis-coping strategy, Consumption Diary (one week), Rice production input and output, Asset, Financial transaction, Social network
